<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Updating Portfolio Project's display field to Project column.</description>
        <name>Update Portfolio Project display field</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function remove_existing_display_field() {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    gr.addQuery('name', 'pm_portfolio_project');
    gr.addQuery('element', 'short_description');
    gr.addQuery('display', true);
    gr.setLimit(1);
    gr.query();

    if (gr.next()) {
        gr.setValue('display', false);
        gr.update();
        gs.log('Removed display flag from pm_portfolio_project -> short_description dictionary field');
        return true;
    } else {
        gs.log('"short_description" column of pm_portfolio_project is not found or Display flag is already set to false');
        return false;
    }
}

function update_display_field() {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    gr.addQuery('name', 'pm_portfolio_project');
    gr.addQuery('element', 'pm_project');
    gr.addQuery('display', false);
    gr.setLimit(1);
    gr.query();

    if (gr.next()) {
        gr.setValue('display', true);
        gr.update();
        gs.log('Set display flag true for pm_portfolio_project -> pm_project dictionary field');
    }

}
var removedExistingFlag = remove_existing_display_field();
if (removedExistingFlag)
    update_display_field();]]></script>
